thread.title: Sterilised mum has more children after reverse operation | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Sterilised mum has more children after reverse operation | Daily Mail Online

author: Kim Willis
title: Sterilised mum has more children after reverse operation | Daily Mail Online
text: ‘I wasn't done being a mum’: Mother-of-three who was sterilised at 25 has the operation REVERSED after meeting her new husband – and goes on to have two more children Leanne Drummond was sterilised six months after giving birth to her third child But she later regretted her decision after meeting her now husband Paul After undergoing a reversal procedure she fell pregnant with her fourth child She gave birth to Matilda in 2015, who was diagnosed with Down's Syndrome Last month the couple welcomed their second child, a son called Myles
